short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension will read you news Headlines from Inshorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Inshort News Reader (Unofficial)" is a Chrome extension designed to read out the latest news stories from the Inshorts website. Inshorts is a popular news platform that provides short, crisp, and unbiased news stories in a simple and easy-to-understand format. With this extension, users can stay up-to-date with the latest news without having to read through lengthy articles or scroll through their social media feeds.

The Inshorts News Reader extension is a great choice for users who want to stay informed about the latest news but may not have the time or inclination to read through long articles or watch news videos. It is also a great option for users who prefer to consume news in an audio format while working or doing other tasks. With this extension, users can get their daily dose of news in a quick and convenient way, without any distractions or interruptions.
